c74object.name: mvc.cascade~
c74object.description: mvc.cascade~ provides the cascade~ multi-filters object as an MVC component.

objarg.name: parent-UID
objarg.digest: The device or model's name, to which this component's model is bound.

method.name: GUI
method.description: The device's GUI contains a preset menu which allows to store global presets for all models and parameters attached to this device.

method.name: param
method.digest: Set a specific parameter's value of this component.
method.description: You can set any parameter's value belonging to your model by sending the message param followed by the parameter name and the value(s). The syntax also allows to address sub-model parameters with the correct prefix. You can also use the brace-expansion syntax to address multiple parameters.

method.name: preset
method.description: You can recall a specific preset for your model, by sending the message preset followed by the preset name.
